title: 2013 Clive Staples Award
author: VD
content_html: Voting for the five finalists for the Clive Staples Award is now live until July 17th.  After the five finalists are selected, another round of voting will determine the winner.  If you are interested in voting, you can do so here.
content_text:
Voting for the five finalists for the Clive Staples Award is now live until July 17th.  After the five finalists are selected, another round of voting will determine the winner.  If you are interested in voting,
you can do so here
